projects.title: Dahlia asbl
projects.description: Dahlia asbl is a non profit association web site built in React. Whith Dahlia, you can make a donation throught PayPal, Visa card or Mastercard. Dahlia web  site is bilingual

projects.title: MagoEat Frontend
projects.description: MagoEat is an online restaurant that allows users to order from their prefered restaurants, built in React Native, It has Android and iOS versions in French

projects.title: Dashboard Covid
projects.description: This project is about monitoring covid19 desease in DRC, managing health zones, updating dayly situation, Official dashboard of the Ministry of Health

projects.title: MagoEat Backend
projects.description: THis is the backend project built with ExpressJs, Mongodb and Mongoose as the ORM. This app makes the frontend Mobile App dynamic and connects it to the datanase

projects.title: e-CREDDHO
projects.description: A Humanitarian Research Center mobile application for collecting data and chat feature with administrators and other users

projects.title: MagoEat Presentation
projects.description: A single page web site where users can find links to directly download MagoEat applications for both Android and iOS

projects.title: MagoEat Dashboard
projects.description: The Dashboard of administrators of MagoEat Applicationm, that allows administrators to add Restaurant, accept orders, assign delivers, ...
